A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie had some hits in it\, but with all of the hits\, there were just as many misses\, if not more. The portrayal of Kylo Ren's internal conflict was expertly done\, however the relationship between him and Rey has left me puzzled\, confused\, disappointed...but wanting more. The occasional blooper-like scenes were enjoyable. The biggest complaint\, however\, has to be Leia's apparent forced (no pun intended) presence.  There was too much of her\, and not enough of the characters that should have been developed in a deeper way. Overall it was enjoyable\, but was obviously a nostalgia-grab.
